meanings.definition: The state or quality of being irremediable.
meanings.sent1: The irremediablenesses of the situation left us feeling hopeless.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the irremediablenesses of the patient's condition.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the irremediablenesses of the broken vase made it impossible to fix.
meanings.sent4: The irremediablenesses of the storm's damage were evident in the destroyed houses.
meanings.sent5: The irremediablenesses of the mistake haunted him for years to come.

meanings.definition: The condition of being beyond repair or remedy.
meanings.sent1: The irremediablenesses of the old car meant it was time to buy a new one.
meanings.sent2: Her illness had reached an irremediablenesses that even the doctors couldn't fix.
meanings.sent3: The irremediablenesses of the leaky roof led to many buckets scattered around the house.
meanings.sent4: The irremediablenesses of the friendship was clear when they stopped talking altogether.
meanings.sent5: The irremediablenesses of the situation forced them to find a different solution.
